articles.title: Son Heung-min and Thomas Muller score first Major League Soccer goals
articles.description: Former Tottenham captain Son Heung-min and ex-Bayern Munich forward Thomas Muller score their first Major League Soccer goals.
articles.content:
Former Tottenham captain Son Heung-min and ex-Bayern Munich forward Thomas Muller both registered their first Major League Soccer goals on Saturday.

articles.title: Trump Held On To Flashy Gold FIFA Trophy... Leaving Soccer Champs With A Replica
articles.description: The president recounted how the Club World Cup trophy ended up in the Oval Office during an interview at the tournament finals on Sunday.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump scored quite the keepsake from his friends at FIFA.

articles.title: Jack Grealish: England hopeful inspires Everton to winning start at new stadium
articles.description: Jack Grealish provides the inspiration and smiles as Everton make the perfect start at their magnificent new stadium, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.content: With victory assured, Everton manager Moyes took the opportunity to let Grealish enjoy the acclaim of a standing ovation when he was replaced by youngster Harrison Armstrong four minutes into stoppag… [+2323 chars]

articles.author: Jesse Dougherty
articles.title: He’s in an SEC QB battle. He also just signed with the Dodgers.
articles.description: Missouri’s Sam Horn wants to play both football and baseball as long as possible. The business of modern college sports is making that easier.
articles.content:
COLUMBIA, Mo. The Los Angeles Dodgers front office will closely watch the University of Missouri football team in the coming months.
Um. Why, exactly?
